description: Situated on a small square with an attractive outdoor space, this restaurant offers a menu which features fish from the lake and other seasonal produce prepared with both modern and traditional techniques, but always with a contemporary flair. The focus is on locally sourced (zero-mile, wherever possible) produce.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
